Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Loads all plugins that are registered for the current site context and that share a group. The ordering numbers which you did define in your plugin contents are internally handled, i.e., iterating over the plugin list needs no extra ordering efforts.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the request URI for a plugin resource. Useful to include JavaScript and CSS resources.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the VFS path for a plugin resource. Useful to include JSP files.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the attributes for a plugin definition. Useful to provide additional configuration for plugin functionality.
